channel.title: Azure Sphere Development Kit on This Is My Demo
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Sphere Development Kit on This Is My Demo

item.title: My Azure Sphere Needs Reset?
item.description: So I needed to break out my Azure SPhere Development kit again that I haven’t touched in a very long time. Since then, the tenant my Azure Sphere was registered to has changed, and along with other things like my memory in my aging head, I couldn’t remember for the life of me how to access the kit. So this blog is mainly for me so in 6 months when I need to use my Azure Sphere development kit again I will have a quick and easy reminder.
